Bash(GIT_COMMITTER_NAME="chunkstar" GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL="racason@gmail.com" git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
BAI Integration: 2025 agents with L0-L8 hierarchy

New systems integrated from BAI ai-workforce:
- Hierarchy levels (L0-L8) as role designation
- Consultation system with consensus calculation
- Knowledge system (18 types) with vector embeddings
- Shadow Agent system (10 observer types)
- Agent signals & callbacks for event-driven behavior

Agent stats:
- Total: 2025 agents (was 1888)
- Upgraded: 852 with BAI features
- Added new: 1025 agents
- Hierarchy: L0(219) L1(1331) L2(209) L3(114) L4(58) L5(30) L6(23) L7(22) L8(19)

New features:
- lib/hierarchy/types.ts - L0-L8 role definitions
- lib/consultation/ - Agent-to-agent consultation + safety gates
- lib/knowledge/types.ts - 18-type knowledge system
- lib/shadow/ - Shadow agent observations & alerts
- lib/agents/agent-signals.ts - Event-driven signal system
- lib/agents/agent-callbacks.ts - Automated callback handlers
- lib/monitoring/agent-monitor.ts - Real-time agent monitoring
- lib/vetting/pipeline.ts - Agent vetting pipeline
- 3 new Supabase migrations for all systems
- 266 tests (all passing)
